tool.name: Chat with your data
tool.command: echo "Starting Streamlit" && echo "Script executed from: `pwd`" && cd /ChatAnalysis && streamlit run chat_analysis.py #if $input_csv $input_csv #end if #if $openai_api_key $openai_api_key #end if

param.name: input_csv
param.label: Data(csv or tsv) you want to chat with

param.name: openai_api_key
param.label: Your OpenAI API Key(if you want to provide)
